StringTable.Label: RaidersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: -50% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and -50% [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] on all worlds.[BR][BR] Gain +100 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +20 [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] for winning battles. [BR][BR] Gain +500 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +200 [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] for conquering planets. [BR][BR] Starts with the Armed Shuttles Tech.

StringTable.Label: WarFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Begins with Fighters and a Siege ship.

StringTable.Label: ExterminatorsAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Transport ships are replaced with planet killing Spore Ships.

StringTable.Label: GenocidalAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Massive advantage in conquering planets due to not caring in the least about collateral damage. [BR][BR]Can convert other species unfortunate enough to end up on their planets into living neural network batteries.
